remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Valve is closed except for engine start,
Aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions, and
Both engine bleed valves are operative.
Operations into known or forecast icing conditions are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard ISOLATION VALVE switchlight located on Bleed Air Supply Module (10259) on P5 panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: Inoperative valve must be manually positioned open for engine start and then manually closed prior to departure.

numlitem.para: Open and collar AIR SUPPLY ISOLATION VALVE POWER circuit breaker (11B3).
Manually position manual override lever to OPEN for engine start.
Following engine start, position override lever to CLOSE.
